plugin_desc: By collecting runtime performance data and stability metrics of Zookeeper, such as uptime, average latency, and read-write ratios, users can monitor the cluster status in real-time and optimize performance.
name: Zookeeper

metrics.name: zookeeper_uptime
metrics.description: This metric shows the uptime of the Zookeeper service, helping to monitor if the system is running normally.

metrics.name: zookeeper_avg_latency
metrics.description: This metric represents the average latency of Zookeeper processing requests, used to monitor system response capability.

metrics.name: zookeeper_read_write_ratio
metrics.description: This metric represents the ratio of commits to snapshots in Zookeeper, helping to assess the read/write load distribution.

metrics.name: zookeeper_snapshot_to_commit_ratio
metrics.description: This metric represents the ratio of snapshot generation frequency to commit request frequency in Zookeeper, helping to monitor the relationship between persistence operations and transaction commits.

metrics.name: zookeeper_connection_drop_count
metrics.description: This metric represents the number of connection drops in Zookeeper, used to monitor connection stability.

metrics.name: zookeeper_connection_rejected
metrics.description: This metric represents the number of rejected connections in Zookeeper, helping to monitor if connections are being correctly handled.

metrics.name: zookeeper_znode_count
metrics.description: This metric represents the number of znodes in Zookeeper, helping to monitor changes in Zookeeper's data size.

metrics.name: zookeeper_packets_received
metrics.description: This metric shows the number of packets received by Zookeeper, helping to monitor the network traffic.
